front.title: Inter-AS Option B between NVO3 and MPLS EVPN network

abstract.t: This draft describes option-B inter-as connection between NVO3 network and MPLS EVPN network. Comparing to traditional MPLS EVPN Option-B inter-as connection, this draft provides enhancement for heterogeneous network multi-as connection, the control plane and data plane procedures in NVO3 network are described.
